page.title: 02Farming in Bugbrooke area.
page.content: There are 8 farms in this area ranging from 7 acres to 800 acres - totalling approx 2000 acres and employing from 2 to 20 workers depending on the time of year. The majority of the acres are used to grow crops. {Crops grown include} Wheat, barley, oats, oilseed rape, potatoes, soft fruits,peas,and vegetables. {Machinery used} Tractors, combine harvesters, ploughs drills, potato planters and harvesters and milking machines. {Approx total animals in the area} 900 beef cattle, 1000 sheep, 1000 pigs, 100 dairy cows, 2100 hens and a number of horses.
